H0.text: What was Tony Blair’s constituency. Sedgefield

H1.text: What was Tony Blair’s constituency. Newcastle upon Tyne Central

H2.text: What was Tony Blair’s constituency. Gateshead

H3.text: What was Tony Blair’s constituency. Segfield

A4.text: Sedgefield was a constituency in County Durham represented in the House of Commons of the UK Parliament from 1918 to 1974 and again from 1983 to 2024.

A5.text: From 1983 to 2007, its MP was Tony Blair, who served as Prime Minister from 1997 to 2007.
